```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


#libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
```

#dataload
```{r}
tree <- read_tsv("../../data/normalized_donor_data_tree.tab", col_names = FALSE)
```

#renaming col names
```{r}
tree <- tree %>% 
  rename(donor = X1, 
         peptide = X2, 
         si = X3, 
         best_7_allele_rank = X4, 
         best_donor_rank = X5, 
         normalized_7_allele = X6, 
         normalized_donor = X7)
```
